p: The leaves of three analyzed samples were pubescent, green color, closed venation (actinodroma), short petiole, oblong-oval contour, dentateâ€“lobulate, rounded apex, truncated-subacorazonate base, sometimes obtuse or somewhat acute. Although the leaf dimensions of sample PhI appear to be higher, no statistical differences ( p > 0.05) were found between the samples ( Figure 2). The stems were green, cylindrical, herbaceous and pubescent.
